products.name: Natures Head 2
products.description: 21 inch high portible toilet with build in waste compartments and agitator. Uses a 12V plug for a fan exhaust system.
pros: Drops waste into a holdiong container, leaving your mess out of sight
Venting hose including to divert smells and gases away from the toilet
cons: Semi-clear urine container doesn't hide urine levels.

products.name: Airhead
products.description: ~20 inch tall portible toilet with build in waste compartments and agitator.
pros: Urine container has a small window that hides urine levels unless it needs to be emptied
Waste reservoir at the bottom comes with a lid for easy tranport to a dumpsite without the extra weight of the top or the embarassment of carrying an open container of poop

products.name: C-Head
products.description: 18 inch tall dry toilet. Also available in a 15in tall shorty model

products.name: Squatty Potty
products.description: A stool that helps achieve a more 'natural' position when pooping.
pros: Proved to reduce time on the toilet
cons: You'll never see ice cream the same again

products.name: Lovable Loo
products.description: 16 inch tall box that can house a 5 gallon bucket to catch wastes.
pros: Can easily be painted for decoration/customization

products.name: Separett
products.description: Product line of similarly designed toilets that handle your waste in different ways. These include freezing and incinerating options.
cons: Some models require electricity and or water

products.name: Super Cheap Seat On Bucket
products.description: A basic 5 gallon bucket with a plastic seat attached. Sits at 15.5 inches high(.5in less than ADA handicap height).
cons: Some reviews complain of weak bucket construction

products.name: Nicer Seat on Bucket
products.description: 16 inch tall flushless and waterless toilet.
pros: Holds up to 8 gallons of waste

products.name: Thetford - Porta Potti 565E
products.description: Portible wet toilet, holds up to 4 gallons of fresh water and 5 gallons of waste(good for appoximately 56 flushes).
